metadata.name: Balance
metadata.description:
Balance

Dimensions: 5568 x 3712 pixels
Author: Ali Ghorbani
Edition: 1/1

This collection took 6 months of planning, highlighted by a 1-day photoshoot with a truly amazing team of Artists. These works of Art represent the power, elegance, harmony and limitless characteristics of the Sea.   

With this collection, Simpson Marine becomes Asiaâ€™s first yachting company to create an NFT collection.  Being part of and creating history is not only an honor for me, but I also hope it inspires more Artists to follow their passions.  

The first collectors are entitled to an amazing set of utilities:  

- A high resolution JPG as a digital asset.
- Eligibility to use their NFT towards the purchase of a yacht, the value of which will be based on certain terms and conditions.
- A museum quality print of their NFT signed by Ali G in a 1/1 edition.
- Access to one VIP event hosted by Simpson Marine (to be proposed individually) .
- Two premium tickets to a Hong Kong Ballet show in 2022.
